attributes.action: stop the Islam4UK's planned demonstration through the town of Wooton Bassett.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is to stop the proposed demonstration of Islam4UK through the Wiltshire town of Wooton Bassett. The town has been the place of repatriation of the dead service men who have fought and died on our behalf. We owe them a debt of gratitude.

This petition does not call on the Government to censor what Islam4UK are saying or to stop any form protest or free speech. But the selection of Wooton Bassett as the place of protest is a disgrace to those who have fallen, those who have been injured, those who have served in the past, those who continue to serve and to those who hold our Armed Forces in such high esteem.

Please sign the petition to call for the Government to block the protest through the streets of Wooton Bassett.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
